name: Oliver Spiegelman
story: Cameron grew up in a small town in Zimbabwe. He had a passion for the military, which led him to join the British Army at the age of 19. After serving for 10 years, he left the army to start his own private security company. However, Cameron missed being in the military and decided to join the BLUFOR forces as an Ammo Bearer. He is known for his calm and collected personality, making him a valuable asset in times of crisis.
